name: fslswapdim_exe
author: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford
description: Tool to swap the x, y, z axes dimensions of an image

inputs.description: New x-axis in terms of old axes (-x, x, y, -y, z, -z)
inputs.name: Axis A

inputs.description: New y-axis in terms of old axes (-x, x, y, -y, z, -z)
inputs.name: Axis B

inputs.description: New z-axis in terms of old axes (-x, x, y, -y, z, -z)
inputs.name: Axis C

inputs.description: Output image file (optional, cannot be used with --checkLR flag)
inputs.name: Output File

inputs.description: Option to check if the specified arguments lead to a Left-Right swap or not, cannot be used with an output name
inputs.name: Check Left-Right Swap Flag

groups.description: Main inputs for the fslswapdim tool
groups.name: Main Program Parameters

output-files.description: Output image file with swapped dimensions
output-files.name: Output File
